data.title: A Lamps ZERO/POINT From A Lobby
data.description: This ZERO/POINT lineup is useful for both suppressing and gathering information on players in Lamps with low risk of the ZERO/POINT being destroyed. The travel time of the ZERO/POINT is high, but when timed well it can make it more difficult for the Defenders to hold Lamps.

data.title: B Garden ZERO/POINT From Behind Fountain Spawn Barrier
data.description: This ZERO/POINT for B Garden from behind the Fountain Spawn Barrier is difficult to destroy / react to. The travel time of the ZERO/POINT is high, but when timed well it can make it more difficult for the defenders to hold B Garden / B Long.

data.title: B Hookah ZERO/POINT From Behind Fountain Spawn Barrier
data.description: This ZERO/POINT lineup is useful for both suppressing and gathering information on players in Hookah, with low risk of the ZERO/POINT being destroyed. The travel time of the ZERO/POINT is high, but when timed well it can make it more difficult for the defenders to hold Hookah, or hard clear Hookah for you and your team.

The travel time of the ZERO/POINT is high, but when timed well it can make it more difficult for the Defenders to hold Hookah, or hard clear hookah for you and your team.
